note:
Mercenary adjunct with a day job, too. Peaceworker and conflict specialist. Likely to hand out reading lists at the slightest provocation. #ActuallyAutistic. Find me at George Mason University, the University of Colorado, or the Better Business Bureau in DC.

Interests: systemic violence, critical conflict resolution, nonviolent strategy, activism.

Teaching: Activism, conflict theory, peace studies, human rights, organizational conflict, nonviolence, community building, and more...
